Posts.Content: Hello, I had surgery for 2 liver mets along with removal of my bowel tumour. I'm now on chemo and doing Ok. They removed half or the liver but it is back after 4 months.It is a remarkable organ. Good luck with your appointment. Love Jen XX
Posts.Title: liver secondaries

Posts.Content: I had capecitabine and oxaliplatin but that was because the primary cancer was in my bowel. Different cancers require different chemos and although it was in my liver it was still bowel cancer. Good luck with the scan. Jen xx
Posts.Title: liver secondaries
